page.title: 12Trade,Abermorddu & District
page.content: {Alyn Home And Garden Centre:}This was bought by Suzanne and Ron Jones in 1983 and has recently formed a complex of interesting retail outlets including a D.I.Y. store, a Gardening shop, a Fancy Goods shop, a Tropical Fish centre, a Dog Grooming Parlour and a Sign Services Supplier. Customers come mainly from the local villages between Mold and Wrexham. {Alyn Aquatics:}Alyn Aquatics was opened in June 1984 by Eric and Janet Jones.It stocks a large variety of coldwater and tropical fish as well as providing many of the accessories associated with this hobby. It can be found opposite Alyn Fish Farm on the A541 at Cefn-y-Bedd,midway between Mold and Wrexham,on the Alyn Home and Garden Centre site. The owners are helped by two children at the week-ends and holidays.
